CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 25, 1953, pg. 28 reads: "Presented To Hill City - When the Platter Fashions Fan Club presented this tape recorder to Hill City out of funds taken in at a benefit dance at the Famous Door recently, among those present were Mrs. Thomas Ficklin, Howard C. McKinney, director of Hill City, and Earsley Kincaid. - Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mrs. Thomas Ficklin, Howard C. McKinney, Hill City director, and Earsley Kincaid, standing behind desk with reel to reel tape recorder
